King of Burma and dominions | Hanthawadd.Coronation: 11 January 1551 at Toungoo | 12 January 1554 at Pegu

Suzerain of Lan Xang.Reign: 2 January 1565 - c. January 1568 | February 1570 - early 1572 | 6 December 1574 - 10 October 1581
Suzerain of Lan Xang.Born: 16 January 1516 | Wednesday, 12th waxing of Tabodwe 877 ME | Toungoo (Taungoo)
Suzerain of Lan Xang.Died: 10 October 1581 | (1581-10-10) | (aged 65) | Tuesday, Full moon of Tazaungmon 943 ME | Pegu (Bago)
Suzerain of Lan Xang.Consort: Atula Thiri | Sanda Dewi | Yaza Dewi
Inwa Mibaya | Nanda | Nawrahta Minsaw | Nyaungyan | Min Khin Saw | Yaza Datu Kalaya | Thiri Thudhamma Yaza

Regnal name: Śrī Tribhuvana Aditya Pavara Paṇḍita Sudharma Rājā Maha Adhipati သီရိ တြိဘု၀နာဒိတျ ပ၀ရ ပဏ္ဍိတ သုဓမ္မရာဇာ မဟာဓိပတိ
